allSegments.contentHtml:
I am Alan Ionita.,

A Software Developer from
sunny Manchester. ☀️,

Currently working at Mission Labs,

Building clever contact center solutions.

Teaching Assistant at The University of Manchester,

Top UK university and the birthplace of the modern computer.,

Regular mentor at Codebar,

Free monthly programming workshops for diverse communities.,

Original co-organiser of CodeYourFuture Manchester,

Non-profit coding school for refugees.
